thread.section_title: Leibish & Co. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Leibish & Co. | leibish.com
thread.title: W.C. Davis
thread.title_full: Leibish & Co. reviewed by W.C. Davis

author: W.C. Davis
title: W.C. Davis
text: My diamond buying experience through Leibish & Co. was first rate every step of the way. Thanks to Mali, I was able to acquire an astounding natural yellow diamond for an unbeatable price. Customer service was exceptional, better than any company I have dealt with. Communication was prompt and informative. As my first onkine dismind experience, I was initally hesitant about buying a diamond without physical inspection, but Mali's feedback detailing specific diamond characteristics (optics, color distribution, saturation, etc.) was reassuring about the quality of product being represented. Mali found me exactly what I was looking for, and I thank him immensely. I honestly could not be happier or be any more pleased with my experience with Leibish & Co. I would highly recommend Leibish & Co. to anyone in the market for an exquisite diamond. I will surely do business with Mali and Lebish & Co. again in the future, without hesitation. Thanks again.
